&&7[ItemSwapper]&&r Press and hold &&7[&&r&&6TAB&&r&&7]&&r to open up a UI that will let you swap anything from your hand with things in your inventory. Much faster than Shift-Clicking. You can also set up block palettes that will let you easily swap between similar items.

&&7[Reacharound]&&r When a &&3visual [- -] indicator&&r appears at the crosshair, you can place blocks on &&dnormally unreachable sides&&r - Useful for building &&dbridges, walls, and downward staircases&&r.

There are many other blocks and items to help with building easily. Here's a Toolbox to get you started - /6/you might not want to claim it until you start with your first project,/6/ just to save you some inventory space.
You can hold &&7[&&r&&6ALT&&r&&7]&&r when a toolbox is nearby to see all of the items inside and quickly swap to them.
